text: Yara nijera anista kare, pheresatara tadera prana harana kare bale, tomara ki abasthaya chile? Tara baleh e bhukhande amara asahaya chilama. Pheresatara baleh allahara prthibi ki prasasta chila na ye, tomara desatyaga kare sekhane cale yete? Ata'eba, edera basasthana hala jahannama ebam ta atyanta manda sthana.
